channel.title: 🏢 University of Texas at Dallas on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: LLM4SR: A Survey on Large Language Models for Scientific Research
item.description: LLMs revolutionize scientific research! This survey reveals their transformative potential across hypothesis discovery, experiment planning, writing, and peer review, guiding future research.
